job.title: Junior Software Engineer
job.description: Who We AreltbrgtltbrgtEnhance IT is an ITManagement firm that specializes in training placement and IT consultation We are an industry leader in providing toplevel skilled and experienced consultants in a variety of technologies to meet our client s needs in today s fast paced environmentltbrgtltbrgtWhat you will be doingltbrgtltbrgtYou will be joining our cuttingedge development team as it grows We want individuals who are comfortable asking why The ideal candidate for this role is motivated energized and has a creative thought process They are a team player possessing strong analytical as well as technical skills and are able to communicate the logic behind technical decisions to nontech stakeholders They must be comfortable working in an agile environment and have the ability to take the wheel when necessaryltbrgtltbrgtWhat you need for this positionltbrgtltbrgtAn objectoriented programming language such as Java C or Kotlin or C or objective C or PythonltbrgtltbrgtSound understanding of the entire Software Development LifecycleltbrgtltbrgtStrong knowledge of Software Design Patterns data structures and best practicesltbrgtltbrgtBachelors degree in Computer Science Computer Engineering Information Systems or related fieldltbrgtltbrgtStrong written and verbal communication skillsltbrgtltbrgtAvailability to travel and live in the USltbrgtltbrgtBonus pointsltbrgtltbrgtHands on experienceltbrgtltbrgtdeveloping software with Agile Scrum or Kanban methodologiesltbrgtltbrgtinteracting with REST Web APIs XML or Jsonltbrgtltbrgtusing a VCS like Git or SVNltbrgtltbrgtworking with third party libraries for Java using Maven or GradleltbrgtltbrgtltstronggtltugtAdditional Criteria SkillsltbrgtltbrgtltugtltstronggtHands on experience withltbrgtltbrgtSoftware Testing using tools like JUnit and MockitoltbrgtltbrgtSoftware Integration tools like JIRA Jenkins
